listing_company_name: McGrath Estate Agents - Coast and Hinterland
description:
Gracing a supreme waterfront allotment, this generously proportioned, high-end residence set in a premiere location embodies bold, architectural beauty and creates an unquestionable focus on entertaining and lifestyle at its finest.

Set against a glistening backdrop framed by never to be built out parkland with lush, tropical greenery, this spectacular waterfront abode encompasses a serene, coastal atmosphere that can be enjoyed throughout the years.

Artfully crafted throughout, the distinction between indoor and outdoor living has been seamlessly achieved by the ingenious design and use of glass stacking doors connecting the shared spaces. A centrally positioned kitchen with an exceptional butler's pantry, stone island bench with breakfast bar, and quality appliances allow the home chef easy interaction with the open plan living and dining zones.

As the tranquil surroundings draw you outward, you'll pass through a designer alfresco with an outdoor kitchen, purposefully created to cater for larger family gatherings and enjoy waterside dining while the sun sets, and the twinkling lights emerge.

Accommodation can be found on the upper level where four lovely bedrooms surround a casual family room and a sizeable home office. The magnificent principal suite sits peacefully on the waterside and boasts sparkling vistas through louvered glass windows. A tasteful walk-in wardrobe and elegant ensuite serve the master bedroom, whilst a timeless family bathroom with a deep bathtub serves beds two, three, and four.

The lifestyle options that this spectacular residence provides are abundant. Drop in a kayak or a SUP from your own back door and paddle through the crystal-clear waterways. Beyond your front door, you'll have ready access to a thriving community that is fast becoming one of the most desirable coastal locations in QLD.

With world-class health facilities, excellent shopping, dining, and entertaining, and pristine beaches within close reach, now is the time to make your dreams a reality. We look forward to welcoming you to one of our open homes.

- Waterfront entertaining and dining area
- Covered alfresco with outdoor kitchen
- Central kitchen with Smeg oven, convection oven and Miele dishwasher
- Walk-through butler's pantry inclusive of a second sink and plumbed fridge
- Multiple living and tranquillity zones across both levels
- Zoned, ducted air-conditioning, ceiling fans throughout
- Double lock up garage with additional parking for two cars
